maple: A004005:=-(-1-89*z+69*z**2+405*z**3)/(-1+25*z)/(9*z-1)**2/(z-1)**3; # Conjectured by _Simon Plouffe_ in his 1992 dissertation.A004005 := proc(n) A060628(n,2) ; end proc: seq(A004005(n),n=2..40) ; # _R. J. Mathar_, Jan 30 2011
mathematica: maxn = 16; se = Series[JacobiSN[u, m], {u, 0, 2*maxn+1}]; cc = Partition[CoefficientList[se, u], 2][[All, 2]]; cc2 = (CoefficientList[#, m] & /@ cc)*Table[(-1)^n*(2*n+1)!, {n, 0, maxn}]; Table[cc2[[n+1, n-1]], {n, 2, maxn}](* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 17 2012 *)
